description: Manage and configure Azure Firewall network rule collections.

commands.name: az network firewall network-rule collection delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure Firewall network rule collection.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall network-rule collection delete [--collection-name]
                                                   [--firewall-name]
                                                   [--ids]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--subscription]

commands.name: az network firewall network-rule collection list
commands.summary: List Azure Firewall network rule collections.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall network-rule collection list --firewall-name
                                                 --resource-group

commands.name: az network firewall network-rule collection show
commands.summary: Get the details of an Azure Firewall network rule collection.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall network-rule collection show [--collection-name]
                                                 [--firewall-name]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
